Chute works with some of the world’s biggest brands and publishers including Benefit Cosmetics, NBCUniversal, adidas, Brown-Forman, Condé Nast, NBA, United Nations, New York Times, and Ford. For more information, visit www.getchute.com.

name: Amplitude
long_description:
Since graduating from YC, Amplitude (W12) has made it to IPO and beyond by helping cutting edge startups become category leaders. We’ve pioneered the digital analytics category to become the go-to solution for AI pioneers (Cruise, Midjourney), apps that touch millions of consumers (Doordash, Coinbase), and the best in B2B (Atlassian, Rippling, Canva).  

With product analytics, experiment, CDP, session replay, and more, Amplitude’s digital analytics platform shows you what your users love, where they’re getting stuck, and what keeps them coming back. You want to build a generational business, and we have the capabilities and pricing plans to guide you every step of the way. Check out our special deal for YC companies and get started on your analytics journey.
one_liner: Digital Analytics Platform

name: OneSignal
long_description:
OneSignal is the leading omnichannel customer engagement solution, powering personalized customer journeys across mobile and web push notifications, in-app messaging, SMS, and email. Our easy-to-use interface empowers content creators to focus on quality user engagement instead of complex implementation.

Our powerful platform enables over a million businesses to deliver 10 billion messages daily and 1 in 7 new apps launches using OneSignal! We support companies in 140 countries, including Zynga, USA Today, Bitcoin.com, Upwork, Tribune, and many more - from startups and small businesses just getting off the ground to established companies communicating with millions of customers.
one_liner: Engage customers through personalized omni-channel messaging

LeadGenius is the most efficient way to equip sales and marketing teams with custom B2B lead data at scale. Our data experts conduct ongoing research to automatically supply teams with accurate contact information and hard-to-acquire data points for your most valuable buyer personas.

By combining a remote global workforce, custom data, and machine learning, LeadGenius delivers the highest lead generation value in the marketplace.

Not a product, and certainly not a feature. We believe that making this clear matters. It sets expectations to ourselves and to our customers. We're based in sunny San Francisco, California.

Our DemandMetrics platform is our core monitoring platform that turns massive amounts of SERP and market data into prioritized insights for growth. Our SERP Intelligence data warehouse accelerates our customer's ability to detect and respond to changes in the search landscape.

name: 500Friends
long_description:
Merkle Loyalty Solutions, formerly 500friends,  is a leader in customer loyalty marketing solutions. Clients depend on us to help them develop and execute a differentiated and impactful customer loyalty strategy that delivers the business results they expect. Merkle Loyalty Solutions is recognized by Forrester Research as a Strong Performer in The Forrester Wave™: Customer Loyalty Solutions, Q3 2017, and as a Leader and received the highest overall score in The Forrester Wave™: Customer Loyalty Solutions For Midsize Organizations, Q1 2016.

The end-to-end loyalty services Merkle Loyalty Solutions offer include: 
- Strategic consulting 
- SaaS loyalty platform named LoyaltyPlus™
- Platform integration
- Program management and support 
- Advanced analytics 

Merkle is a leading data-driven, technology-enabled, global performance marketing agency that specializes in the delivery of unique, personalized customer experiences across platforms and devices. The agency’s heritage in data, technology, and analytics forms the foundation for its unmatched skills in understanding consumer insights that drive people-based marketing strategies. With more than 4,100 employees, the Merkle team is based in Columbia, MD, with 16 additional offices in the US and 8 offices in Europe and Asia. In 2016, the agency joined the Dentsu Aegis Network. Learn more about Merkle Loyalty Solutions at www.500friends.com.

---

We're hiring! Please check out our openings at: www.500friends.com/who-we-are/careers
one_liner: the best loyalty and retention marketing partner for CMOs.

name: Optimizely
long_description:
At Optimizely, we're on a mission to help people unlock their digital potential. We do that by reinventing how marketing and product teams work to create and optimize digital experiences across all channels. With Optimizely One, our industry-first operating system for marketers, we offer teams flexibility and choice to build their stack their way with our fully SaaS, fully decoupled, and highly composable solution. We help companies around the world orchestrate their entire content lifecycle, monetize every digital experience and experiment across all customer touchpoints – all through Optimizely One, the leading digital experience platform that powers every phase of the marketing lifecycle through a single, AI-accelerated workflow. 

Optimizely has nearly 1500 employees across our 21 global offices and has 700+ partners. We are proud to help more than 10,000 businesses, including H&M, PayPal, Zoom, and Toyota, enrich their customer lifetime value, increase revenue and grow their brands. At Optimizely, we live each day with a simple philosophy: large enough to serve, small enough to care. Learn more at optimizely.com.
one_liner: The first all-in-one operating system for marketing

The service also allows clients varied options, like choosing entry requirements, start and end times, and the addition of prizes.

Using our platform, businesses can plan more targeted marketing campaigns and optimize their lead lists, with a focus on maximizing revenue and sales growth. Our platform is currently being used in a variety of industries, including sports, ticket sales, daily deals, and online retail, and customers ranging from $10B retailers to small online businesses.

Canopy Labs has offices in Toronto and New York City. The company is led by CEO Wojciech Gryc, who is a former McKinsey consultant and Rhodes Scholar, and CTO Jorge Escobedo, who has a PhD in Theoretical Physics and researched string theory. It is backed by Y Combinator, BDC IT Ventures Fund, and Valar Ventures.

From entrepreneurs and creative agencies to Fortune 500 companies, Webflow makes the internet a more inclusive place by making the tools to build on it more accessible to more people, fueling business growth. Webflow powers websites for innovators like Discord, Monday.com, IDEO, Orange Theory Fitness, TED, and Dropbox. 

Webflow is backed by Y Combinator, Accel, CapitalG, Silversmith, and other awesome investors.

Y-Combinator (S14)

A/B test your videos, articles, and images on Facebook, and automatically publish the best version everywhere. Get started at www.naytev.com.

Testing is every top social team's secret weapon.
It's no secret that standing out in the News Feed has become more difficult. That's why elite content teams test how the content they post to Facebook will appear.

We help the top brands and publishers in the world stand out in the noise and reach larger audiences. With Naytev's cutting-edge techniques, you can run expert-level tests in a matter of minutes.

Already an expert? We can help you scale your test volume and improve the quality of your tests.

Bizzy is the first tool to centralize a business’ entire marketing portfolio around a single, dynamic set of customer data. As this centralized data updates based on customer behavior and marketing interactions, Bizzy adapts and executes a business'​ campaigns.

name: Interstate Analytics
long_description:
Interstate Analytics helps marketers make smarter decisions. The customers of the company are Betabrand, Outdoor Voices, EVERLANE, and JACK ERWIN. It pulls in its users’ visit, conversion, and spends data across all channels and centralizes it in a dashboard. It allows its users to spend less time wrangling data and more time acting on it. It applies attribution models to its users’ data that take into account all consumer touchpoints and makes better spend allocation decisions with accurate performance data. The company deterministically syncs marketing spends and conversion data across devices.

Interstate Analytics was founded in 2015.
one_liner: Multi-Touch Marketing Analytics

name: Apollo.io
long_description:
Founded in 2015, Apollo.io is a lead intelligence and sales engagement platform trusted by nearly 9,000 paying customers, from rapidly growing startups to some of the largest global enterprises. Our community-based approach to crowdsourcing data gives users maximum coverage while ensuring data accuracy. Our advanced algorithms and unique data acquisition methods help over 500,000 sales professionals enrich and analyze prospects' data to increase quality conversations and opportunities.

We have notable investors: Y Combinator and Nexus Venture Partners. We recently completed a Series B financing to fuel our next growth phase. We have reached and maintained profitability for the last 18 months.

Our growth and customer feedback set us apart from competitors.  Apollo had over one million sign-ups for its platform in the past year, and the number of weekly active users increased by over 400%.  We are a top-ranking G2 Crowd vendor in the Sales Intelligence, Lead Intelligence, Marketing Account Intelligence, and Sales Engagement categories.  Our highest scores are in the B2B data space for accuracy and ROI based on customer reviews.
one_liner: Apollo is the foundation of your entire go-to-market strategy.

long_description: Cartcam is a shopping platform that gives people discounts for creating short video reviews. The company hopes to take advantage of the trend of consumers who are 85% more likely to purchase an item after watching a video. Cartcam incentivizes mobile creators to review items by offering them discounts on the items they want to buy. Already 12 percent of users place an order through the platform, and they are all creating content for Cartcam. The company makes money by partnering with brands who pay for the discounts in exchange for content that will sell more goods for them.
one_liner: Cartcam is an app for opinionated, deal-seeking shoppers.  It gives…

We fix and monitor emails in spam. 

We monitor automatically where your emails is going, we alert you when it's going in spam and we fix it with you.

Best of all, the monitoring is free!

one_liner: One stop shop for creators to launch, manage & grow their knowledge…

name: matagora
long_description:
At Matagora, our team brings over a decade of retail experience. Our mission is to empower independent retailers with the tools they need to compete with big box stores and effectively level out the playing field. One of the biggest challenges we see is staffing — many retailers struggle to maintain consistent, reliable, and properly trained team members to handle back-office tasks, marketing, ecommerce, POS management, and basic tech know-how.

That’s why we offer affordable, ecommerce expertise as a service. Retailers no longer have to worry about high turnover, constant retraining, or trying to learn everything themselves. Instead, they can stay focused on what they love: curating great products and delivering an amazing in-store experience — while we handle the rest. And since it’s a simple expense, it’s easy to plan for and write off, too.
one_liner: Unlocking indie retail’s unfair advantage.

name: Plotdrive
long_description: We're building the world's first AI that actually remembers your entire book - an intelligent writing companion that transforms how stories get finished. Our mission is to solve the #1 reason books die unfinished: writers losing track of their own stories across hundreds of pages. Founded by brothers who've pushed creative boundaries across poker, VR gaming, and interactive storytelling, we combine deep technical expertise with an obsessive focus on what writers actually need. Our CEO, a former world-class poker player, brings the same strategic depth that won millions to ensuring every writer can finally type "The End." We're a team of rebellious optimists who've already helped authors break through decade-long blocks and publish books they thought would never see the light of day. The printing press gave stories reach. We're giving them wings.
one_liner: AI that remembers your book & writes like you

name: PlayAbly
long_description:
PlayAbly turns ignored touchpoints into mini-games that capture attention, drive action, and generate real-time first-party data—across eCommerce, B2B funnels, restaurants, and in-store retail. As attention spans shrink to six seconds, brands can't afford lifeless popups, forms, or landing pages. We replace them with gamified conversion layers—quizzes, swipe games, stackers—that perform like performance marketing.

At Unity, our founding team helped personalize gameplay and ads for over 2 billion users. Now, we're bringing that behavioral insight to brand engagement, building a no-code platform where anyone can launch PlayAbly experiences in minutes. Think: instead of a "Spin to Win," a match-3 game that sells your product, segments your audience, and gets 4× the opt-ins.

Why now? Retargeting costs are up. Email/SMS open rates are down. And today’s customers are conditioned by the dopamine loops of TikTok and mobile games. Generic funnels can’t compete—but interactive ones can.

PlayAbly is already driving results:

Classkick (B2B): 5× ROI, 3× higher email open rates

Skout Snacks (DTC): 7× ROI, 20% higher AOV, 4× opt-in rates

89% of previously lost sessions re-engaged through PlayAbly games

We monetize on a usage + performance model, enabling fast adoption and deep long-term value. We're building a new category: AI-powered gamification that converts attention into intent, on any surface where customers meet brands.

https://www.playably.ai
one_liner: We build games to help brands engage, convert, and retain customers

name: Demand Curve
long_description:
Demand Curve is your startup's growth operating system, the lowest risk, fastest path to getting traction and growing your company.

🚀 Growth Program: A membership/course designed for startup operators who want to learn and execute growth without hiring a full team yet. Powered by our premium content library, expert guidance, and AI growth co-pilot, it's a step-by-step guide to building a growth engine that actually works. Trusted by 3,000+ startups (including over 500 YC companies).

📰 Newsletter: We also publish the Growth Newsletter, reaching 100,000+ founders and marketers every week with strategic and tactical growth advice. It's one of the most-read startup growth newsletters with 46-50% open rates.

🦄 Agency: For companies ready to scale, our agency team provides full-service execution across growth strategy, paid acquisition, and funnel optimization. We've helped scale Microsoft, Framer, Pilot, Ancestry, and hundreds of other companies and YC startups.

💸 Newsletter sponsorships: Get your brand in front of 100,000+ engaged founders and growth operators.

Learn more at demandcurve.com
one_liner: Learn how to build a scalable growth engine

With an intuitive rule engine, marketers can simply add/edit/change rules to generate coupons/rewards/cashbacks or any other incentives. rehook.ai lets you experiment and personalize campaigns around user segments, geographies, demographics, journeys and any other attribute- without ever going back to tech.

Whether you’re running A/B tests, managing campaigns, or optimizing deliverability, Super Send provides the tools you need to maximize engagement and grow your business
one_liner: Super Send automates personalized outreach across email, LinkedIn,…

name: Sprites
long_description:
Sprites AI automates customer acquisition for entrepreneurs. Our AI agent handles managing SEO, running paid ad campaigns, content marketing, influencer outreach—tasks that normally require hiring multiple people or agencies. 

Entrepreneurs using our platform acquire customers much faster and scale their growth funnel without the overhead of building marketing teams or hiring expensive agencies. 

The result: SMBs and solo founders can now scale revenue like they have a full marketing department.

We're arming entrepreneurs and small businesses globally with systematic customer acquisition run by AI- so they can focus on the important things that make their offering unique.
one_liner: The AI marketing agent for entrepreneurs, agencies and growth teams

name: Kular
long_description:
Kular is an AI Lead Generator, generating leads for busy professionals and business owners and only charging for results. Today, Kular generates leads for over 1000 companies via email and LinkedIn. 

Kular is being built by a team of MIT, IIT, Cambridge and Oxford grads, backed by some of the best investors in the world, including Y-Combinator, Entrepreneur First, Acequia Capital and angel investors behind companies like Ironclad, OpenSea and Stripe.
one_liner: AI Lead Generator

name: Vessel
long_description:
Vessel is the developer-first, native integration platform for GTM tools. We make it easy for developers to integrate with your customer’s CRMs, Sales Engagement, Marketing Automation, Chat, Dialers, and more. Integrate in different ways customized for your use cases: 

- Speed: Use our Unified APIs to roll out many integrations quickly through a common data model and unified interface.
- Depth: Use our actions API to build deeper integrations when working with entities custom to each app.
- Ease: Use ETL to let us handle pulling and pushing customer data to your DB
- Extensible: Support any integrations through our open-source integrations library

Breadth and depth, make your integrations limitless.
one_liner: Developer-first, native integration platform for GTM tools

name: CustomerOS
long_description:
CustomerOS uncovers high-fit leads who are engaging directly with your brand but not yet in your sales funnel. By lead scoring your pipeline against your ICP we build data-driven profiles of your best customers and provide a real-time ICP-fit indicator so your team doesn't waste time on low-value/high-cost leads. This ensures you're spending your CAC acquiring customers who are primed to renew year after year and expand as they grow.

The Top 10% of SaaS companies generate 87% of all market returns. CustomerOS gives you the data and tooling to compete with the top 10%.
one_liner: Uncover high-fit leads already silently engaging with your brand

name: Popsy
long_description: Popsy is an AI tool that finds you leads on Reddit and sends them hyper personalized DMs.
one_liner: AI tool that finds you leads on Reddit and sends them hyper…

name: Avina
long_description:
Avina uses AI agents to find prospects that are ready to buy, surface the warmest ones to your team and automate outreach to the rest.

Compare us to tools like Unify or Common Room.
one_liner: GTM signals engine for sales teams. Automate warm outbound with AI.

name: Superbar
long_description: Superbar is the AI-powered search and answer bar built to fix ecommerce conversion. It connects to your product catalog, blogs, videos, and customer reviews to deliver instant, high-converting search results and answers—trained specifically to sell your products. No dev work needed. Just plug it in.
one_liner: Search & Answers Superbar for E-Commerce

name: Gluetrail
long_description:
Gluetrail is a chrome extension that allows you to create support/training/marketing assets 10x faster, just from a screen and audio recording. These assets allow you to drive software or process adoption & awareness among prospects, customers or teammates.  

From one single recording, Gluetrail leverages your screen+clicks+audio transcript, and AI, to:
- automatically create step-by-step articles with screenshots and videos
- adapt the content for & publish it on 3rd party platforms in 1 click: internal or external knowledge bases (Notion, Confluence, Intercom, Zendesk...), community platforms and social media (linkedin, youtube, twitter, discourse...)
one_liner: Create step by step articles with screenshots and videos 10x faster

name: Booth AI
long_description: Booth AI enables companies to supercharge their creative output with a generative-AI powered image production platform. Booth AI replaces complicated, labor intensive, time consuming and expensive commercial product lifestyle photoshoots. Brand managers, merchandisers, and marketers can produce beautiful lifestyle images in a matter of seconds at a fraction of the cost of traditional photoshoots.
one_liner: Generative AI Photographer for E-Commerce

name: 1stCollab
long_description:
1stCollab is the first influencer platform that fully automates and optimizes every aspect of your influencer marketing program. We’ve helped hundreds of startups launch their first campaigns and enabled larger brands to scale to thousands of influencers, while saving them over $1M annually in influencer spend.

What we offer:
- Smart search & recommendations – Instantly connect with thousands of relevant influencers.
- Full campaign automation – From outreach and negotiations to contracts, payments, and taxes, we handle it all.
- Real-time performance tracking – Monitor conversions, revenue, and run A/B tests with detailed reporting.
one_liner: Performance-Optimized Influencer Marketing at Scale

name: Type
long_description: Type.ai is an AI-native document editor designed for long-form professional writing. We make it 10x faster to write high-quality books, novels, essays, screenplays, and long-form content.
one_liner: The AI-first document editor.

name: HockeyStack
long_description:
HockeyStack improves sales outcomes for B2B companies by helping them record and understand every interaction their customers have with their marketing, sales reps, CSMs, and products. 

We map every customer touchpoint from ad impression to closed won and to upsell using our own tracking script and native integrations to the B2B GTM tech stack. 

Building this source of truth allow us to give companies previously hidden insights that generate incremental revenue, such as:

- Deploy marketing budget: "Launch this ad campaign to this audience to generate $XM in pipeline"
- Target the right accounts with the right messaging: "These accounts have the highest likelihood to convert, put them on this email sequence"
- Convert more of the pipeline: “Pied Piper hasn't visited the site for 8 days; give Jim a phone call”
one_liner: The operating system for inbound B2B revenue

name: Kite
long_description:
Kite is a screen recorder that makes your demo videos look like Apple commercials in minutes.

Simply record your app (works for iPhone recordings too!). Kite will track your cursor and keyboard inputs, so it can automatically zoom in on the action with professional 3D animations.

Kite is as easy as Canva, but your videos will look like they came out of OpenAI or Figma.

- One-click cinematic 3D animations
- Display recordings on 3D mockup devices (MacBooks, iPhones etc)
- Combine unlimited recordings into one video
- Edit, adjust speed and trim recordings
- Add text scenes and text annotations alongside recordings
- AI voiceovers using state of the art text to speech models
- Free music library
- Brand kit–upload your logos, colors and fonts
- Start from our template library or start from scratch

Kite is used by hundreds of YC companies for launch videos, social media posts, landing page demos, changelog updates, feature releases and more.
one_liner: Screen recorder for stunning product demo videos

name: maintouch
long_description: We're the ONLY platform to help you rank on both SEO and AI Search. I grew up working at my family's 9 figure SEO agency and learned how to automate everything. That's what we do for people now.
one_liner: the only SEO + AI search platform

name: Surface Labs
long_description:
Surface Labs helps B2B companies capture, qualify, and convert inbound leads through intelligent contact forms. We replace tools like HubSpot Forms, Zapier, and Chili Piper with a single platform that embeds on any site with one line of code.

Our AI agents handle lead capture, enrichment, routing, follow-up, and CRO testing — automating what used to require full marketing ops teams. Customers see a 30% lift in conversions in under 2 weeks, and our partial response capture feature collects 50% more emails from form drop-offs.
one_liner: Building the AI-powered marketing ops platform that turns website…

name: Converge
long_description:
We're building the unified marketing measurement stack for online stores. We make it easy for marketeers to understand where their customers come from, cut unprofitable channels, and scale when things are working.

We are vertically integrating the modern data stack for marketing teams of online stores by consolidating customer data collection, consent management, identity resolution, transformations, attribution, data forwarding, and analytics into a single platform.
one_liner: All-in-one marketing measurement for B2C

name: Rankai
long_description: Rankai is building an AI-powered Marketing Agency, starting with search engine marketing.
one_liner: Jumpstarting SEO/GEO with AI + Human Experts

name: Smobi
long_description: Smobi is the AI-powered platform for branded, interactive business messaging, starting with RCS. We help businesses send rich, personalized messages that drive engagement, build trust, and create real conversations.
one_liner: Send texts your customers actually want over RCS

name: Nowadays
long_description: Nowadays is an AI copilot that automates the boring parts of planning corporate events and retreats. For example, our AI can contact venues by email and phone to get availability, deal with back-and-forth negotiations, and present the best options.
one_liner: AI co-pilot for corporate retreat and event planning

name: Zaymo
long_description:
Recent changes in email clients made it possible to embed a whole website inside an email.  We've built the first email builder that lets Shopify brands create emails that are fully interactive like websites. 

Zaymo emails decrease friction and increase conversion for product marketing and data collection.
one_liner: Interactive email builder for ecommerce brands

name: Resonance
long_description: Resonance hyper-personalizes MarTech campaign content and automatically refreshes and stores high performing content for re-use.
one_liner: Self-improving content bank for marketing

name: JustAI
long_description: Always-on AI agents for 1-1 personalization at scale
one_liner: A modern workflow for lifecycle marketing

name: Yarn
long_description:
Yarn uses AI to help founders, salespeople, and marketers make product and sales videos.

Teams are using Yarn to make sales collateral, launch videos, use-case demos, training guides, and feature updates for Twitter and LinkedIn.

No video experience needed and everything looks great out-of-the-box – think Notion, Linear, or Stripe-quality – but branded for your team.

The magic really comes from AI (TTS, CV, LLMs) – so you can zip through 5x faster than a Loom.
one_liner: Make sales and marketing videos with AI.

name: GetCrux
long_description:
GetCrux is the AI Creative Strategist to launch winning ads.

Creatives have become the biggest lever to win on ad platforms. Yet, there is no clear way to figure out why something works. Marketers end up guessing and replicating the best performing ad, only to see it fail - with high CAC & wasted dollars.

GetCrux helps performance marketers find winning patterns in their ad creatives across 100+ parameters like hooks, messaging, storyline, music, pacing, and recommend exactly what to launch next.
one_liner: AI Creative Strategist

name: Apten
long_description:
Apten is an omni-channel AI agent that engages and nurtures leads across text, call, email, and webchat. 

We help enterprises in consumer services convert more leads.
one_liner: Omnichannel AI agents that engage leads across SMS, voice, and email

name: Gauge
long_description:
Gauge helps your company show up in more AI answers.

With traffic leaving search, traditional SEO is dying. Our customers are seeing inbound traffic from AI answers double every quarter.
one_liner: Get your product featured in AI answers.

name: Stormy AI
long_description:
Stormy: AI-Driven Influencer Marketing

Streamline influencer outreach and let your product shine.
	•	Discover: AI pinpoints ideal influencers with 99.8% accuracy.
	•	Outreach: Auto-send personalized emails and follow-ups.
	•	Close: AI negotiates and finalizes deals seamlessly.

Focus on building—Stormy handles distribution on autopilot.

Founders from YC have discount! Please DM me on twitter: @karmedge or email
one_liner: Al platform that makes social marketing as easy as running a Google…

name: Typa
long_description:
We help businesses capture what resonates, make it repeatable, and turn attention into lasting momentum. With Typa, you can build a scalable inbound growth engine with content that compounds.

We make this possible through three pillars:

1. A tone of voice that always sounds like you. Typa learns your style, cadence, and perspective so every piece of content reflects your authentic voice.

2. A knowledge base that updates in real time. Your digital clone continuously absorbs everything you say and create, ensuring your content always reflects your latest thinking.

3. A personal ghostwriter that’s always just a call away. Puff is your 24/7 AI ghostwriter and strategist, available via phone or WhatsApp whenever you want to brainstorm, plan, or execute.

Currently supported channels: X, LinkedIn, Bluesky, and blog/newsletters.
one_liner: The content engine that wins attention and drives growth.

name: Affil.ai
long_description: We build AI compliance for external marketing. For example, we work with major creators to ensure that their content meets credit card marketing guidelines.
one_liner: AI Affiliate Network For Financial Companies

name: Luthor
long_description:
We’re building the first AI-Native Compliance Firm for RIAs, wealth advisors, and fintechs.

We're doing this by blending AI workflows with veteran ex-regulators so we can keep firms SEC/FINRA-ready in minutes, not days.
one_liner: AI-Native Compliance Firm

name: Unusual
long_description:
Unusual creates, manages, and suggests content engineered to improve how AI models like ChatGPT talk about your product -- driving more leads.

Unusual is the first "AI Relations" platform--PR for AI. We handle three things for brands:

1. A deep analysis of how AI thinks about your market and brand to determine what facts and sources inform its opinion.

2. Publishes and maintains targeted content full of targeted information about your business, hosted at a subdomain designed for AI to read, like llms.your-website.com.

3. Identifies the highest leverage media opportunities for your brand – usually in the form of targeted articles in often-referenced websites, but also on existing pages you own.
one_liner: Change AI's mind about your brand. Get more leads.

name: Bezel
long_description:
Bezel helps fashion brands create virtual photo/video shoots with AI. 

Upload images of clothes, select the human you want to model it, and Bezel generates pictures and videos that rival a full studio production. 

Every detail of the clothing is rendered flawlessly. Try it for yourself.
one_liner: Digital AI humans that model clothes for e-commerce brands.

name: Relixir
long_description:
Relixir is the autonomous GEO platform. We map, monitor, and continuously improve AI search rankings across ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google AIO, etc.

Customers include global marketing teams from 50+ fastest growing companies like Rippling, Airwallex, Retell AI, HackerRank, etc.
one_liner: The Autonomous GEO Platform

name: Golpo
long_description: The world's best AI video generator that turns your documents and/or prompts into whiteboard explainer videos. In addition, we have a similar product that generates podcast-style audio explainers from your documents/prompts. API access available for both video and conversational audio. Product of Red Tree Inc. Please reach out at founders@golpoai.com
one_liner: Most Powerful AI Video Gen Model for Explainer Videos From Documents

name: Kestroll
long_description: AI Digital Asset Manager that automates asset managment busy work, enforces brand guidelines, and supports creative experimentation across every touchpoint of the asset lifecycle.
one_liner: AI Digital Asset Manager

name: Motives
long_description: Motives is a team of AI agents that runs qualitative research projects for consumer brands: moderating and analyzing video interviews to help brands understand consumer preferences and test new ideas, in hours instead of weeks.
one_liner: Consumer focus groups run by AI

name: Nautilus
long_description: Nautilus is the first modern platform built for car washes, replacing expensive legacy systems that cost operators thousands monthly. Nautilus delivers mobile-first e-commerce, membership management, and automated marketing. Learn more at nautilus.co.
one_liner: AI platform to grow and to optimize car washes

name: Eden
long_description:
Eden runs marketing for ecommerce brands. Our AI agents can autonomously schedule campaigns, run A/B tests, and personalize experiences across email, SMS, site display, and more, so brand founders get enterprise-level marketing without needing a team or agency.

Alex and Jason have been best friends for 8+ years. They met at TJHSST, became nationally ranked debate partners, and later coworkers at Datadog. Alex led operations at an AI shopping startup, working directly with brands like TheRealReal, Poshmark, and Farfetch. Jason was at Reddit's mobile ad retargeting team and is a second-time founder, previously exiting an AI recruiting startup doing $50K MRR.
one_liner: Autonomous Marketing AI for Ecommerce Brands

name: Waffer
long_description: Video creation is stuck between uncontrollable AI generators and complex pro tools. Waffer lets you produce and direct animated graphics videos with the ease of a text prompt, while offering the same amount of control as Adobe After Effects.
one_liner: Lovable for Animated Graphics Videos

name: The Hog
long_description:
The Hog maps your ICP, channels, and opportunities across the internet, monitors competitors, communities, keywords, and turns signals into ranked actionable game plans.

The future of go-to-market is command centers, not dashboards. The Hog gives one person the power of an entire sales and marketing team and compresses research into execution in minutes. You control an army of AI sales and marketing copilots that research, write, and execute.

Why now:

Standing out in a crowded market is harder and more important than ever. Companies need fast, adaptable go to market playbooks because buyer behavior and channels change constantly, and what works today may stall tomorrow. The way to stay ahead is for sales, marketing, and growth to operate on the same platform with the same information so insights become coordinated actions in minutes.

Built by operators:

“Head of Growth” is in our name for a reason. The Hog is the dream tool Hudson wished he had when he scaled a startup from about $900K ARR to $7M+ in three months as a solo growth hire, and helped another company pivot to profitability with only two months of runway left. Current customers call the insight “f****** good” and “on another level.”


What we do today:

- Find where your ICP spends time and how they behave across Reddit, LinkedIn, X, forums, and review sites
- Continuous market and competitor monitoring with daily briefs
- Social listening, sentiment tracking, and brand awareness trends
- Strategic positioning and a living Brand and Messaging Guide
- SEO research plus on-brand blog and content drafts
- Digital marketing and PPC planning with keywords and budgets
- Auto-drafts for posts, comments, replies, and community engagement
- Channel strategies for multi-channel motions beyond paid ads


The Hog Guarantee:
Find at least one qualified customer in 30 days or get your money back.
one_liner: Your Go-To-Market Command Center

name: Bluma
long_description:
Bluma makes it effortless for SaaS founders to launch TikTok and Instagram organic campaigns that actually go viral.

Share us viral faceless videos you would like to recreate and we’ll make them into scalable ad templates. Or choose from our growing library of templates like Peter Griffin explainers and slideshows.

These templates generate thousands of videos each month that promote your product. Then we handle posting across a network of accounts.

📩 Contact us at alisa@getbluma.com to set up a call.
one_liner: Automating Short-Form Video Ads at Scale

name: Claybird
long_description:
Claybird is an agent that plans, generates, and edits your AI video ad.

Marketers often rely on agencies to produce video ads - a slow, expensive process involving endless revisions, actors, and shoots.

Claybird is like Lovable for AI ads: it collaborates with marketers on creative direction, generates shots using Veo, Sora, and other top models, and intelligently edits them into a studio-quality video.

When most people try making AI content, it looks like “slop”. But Claybird Agent, like an expert director, understands quality: it knows which camera angle, shot type, and lighting is necessary for each scene.

Get started at claybird.com
one_liner: Claybird plans, creates, and edits your AI video ad.
